description.value: You prepare to ambush a foe. You Ready an activity that takes 2 actions, though that activity must either be Death from Above or an activity with the requirement that you be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] by all your opponents (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Scout's Pounce]). After using the reaction, you cannot use this feat again for 10 minutes.
